title: Bawarchi
cast: Rajesh Khanna, A.K. Hangal, Durga Khote, Jaya Bhaduri, Kali Bannerjee, Usha Kiran, Asrani, Paintal
description: A dysfunctional middle-class family is transformed by the attentions of their talented new chef â€“ until he vanishes along with their valuable jewels.

title: Koshish
cast: Sanjeev Kumar, Jaya Bhaduri, Asrani, Seema, Om Shivpuri, Dina Pathak
description: A speech and hearing-impaired couple persists through unforgiving obstacles to be accepted by society and live a life of dignity.

title: Monty Python's Fliegender Zirkus
cast: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle, Terry Jones, Michael Palin, Connie Booth
description: The Pythons elevate the absurd to new heights and bring their sketches to German TV, working in phonetic German, at times with an Australian accent.

title: Superfly
cast: Ron O'Neal, Carl Lee, Sheila Frazier, Julius Harris, Charles McGregor, Nate Adams, Polly Niles, Yvonne Delaine
description: To get away from the thug life, cocaine dealer Youngblood Priest puts together one last deal that will net him enough money to start over.
